data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Kherson. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kherson, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Kherson to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Kherson.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Kherson with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Tatar, Crimean people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, help the people of Kherson, Ukraine to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Kherson hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the state of Kherson, Ukraine has a population of 1,126,000.

We estimate Kherson has 40,808 people who might know Jesus, 778,305 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 306,887 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 27 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Kherson, Ukraine to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
